Improvements.Improvement: Extract avatar processing to a separate method
Improvements.Description: The method is doing too many things. It's downloading leaderboard scores, processing leaderboard entries, and also processing avatar images. The avatar processing can be extracted to a separate method to make the code cleaner and more readable.
Using System.out.println for logging is not recommended. It's better to use a Logger because it provides levels of logging and can be configured to output logs to different targets.
